FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our advanced Ethereum transaction monitoring. Get instant notifications as soon as new transactions hit the blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain valuable insights into Ethereum transactions with our powerful analysis tools. Dissect transaction data, trace origins, and identify patterns.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Tailor your transaction feed to your specific needs. Set filters based on wallet addresses, transaction values, contract types, and more.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Navigate through transaction data with ease using our intuitive and clean user interface designed for optimal readability and accessibility.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Our app leverages industry-leading security protocols to ensure your data remains safe and your privacy is protected at all times.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Seamlessly integrate our transaction tracking capabilities into your existing tools and workflows through our robust API and SDK offerings.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Ethereum Transaction Explorer
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is the Ethereum Transaction Explorer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: The Ethereum Transaction Explorer is a powerful tool that allows you to search, view, and analyze new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the Transaction Explorer work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new transactions as they are broadcasted. When a new transaction is detected, it is instantly displayed in the app with detailed information.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What data is shown for each transaction?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: For each new transaction, you can see the sender and recipient addresses, the amount of ETH transferred, the transaction fee paid, and the transaction hash for verification on the blockchain explorer.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I filter or search transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, you can filter transactions by sender, recipient, amount ranges, and time periods. The search function also allows you to quickly find specific transactions by hash or address.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about finding new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app allows you to discover and track new Ethereum transactions in real-time. It provides a powerful tool for monitoring the Ethereum blockchain.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new transactions as they are broadcasted. Advanced filters let you narrow down to specific transaction types, addresses, or values.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What can I use it for?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Some popular use cases include tracking incoming payments to your addresses, monitoring smart contract interactions, and staying up-to-date on major Ethereum transactions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, the basic version of the app is completely free. We offer premium paid plans with additional features like notifications and higher data limits.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Simply sign up for a free account on our website. The onboarding process will guide you through connecting your Ethereum wallet or node, and setting up your first transaction monitoring stream.
